NOTE: This app is Open Source hence completely free to use with no Ads at all. Kindly go through our Privacy Policy .

NOTE: Choosing external SD Card can cause some issues / app crashes in downloading images. This is due to Android / Manufacturer restrictions. Kindly refrain from using external SD card if possible. I recommend you to only use Internal Storage.
NOTE: Trending Images are updated here everyday around 5.30 AM GMT
Overall design improvements.
Create/delete custom collection from both profile & image screen.
Pick image quality & location while downloading image.
Custom crop & apply wallpaper.
Option to change common setting like image quality, cache clear etc.
New: Personal profile screen.
Improvement: Revamped main screen to highlight image area more.
Improvement: Revamped categories screen highlighting individual collection.
Improvement: Clear design elements for image details
Improved photographers & search screen.
Single icon design scheme.

No internet connection handling.
Reload icon everywhere if connection fails.

\@dawnimpulse
This application features images from Unsplash via their APIs. All images are free to use and share although kindly read Unsplash guidelines / license for the same.
To avoid any misuse of this app, kindly go through the Terms & Conditions.
For any query / help contact me via Twitter or send me a mail on dawnimpulse@gmail.com
Perform various actions directly on \nUnsplash
Like\nImages
Add Images\nto your\nCollections
Manage \nProfile

Wallup need access to your Unsplash profile with various permissions to help manage your profile (some permissions provided now will be required in future updates). Be assured that we will never collect/store your profile, images or any other info at all.

Wallup provides you with Thousands of Images from the wonderful Unsplash Community right at your fingertips.


And yes, Wallup is also an unofficial client for Unsplash giving you freedom to manage your complete Unsplash profile right on your Android device.

Wallup is powered by UNSPLASH API i.e. everything in this application is possible because of wonderful people at Unsplash. Cheers to them.

Lookout for Unsplash logo in this application which will redirect you to their website either from an image or photographer's profile.

Urge you to go through Unsplash guidelines on using images.
This project is Open Source & completely free to use. We only collect crash data & some analytics. There will be no personal data collected at all.

Don't want to share crash data or analytics ?
Change image quality ?

Visit Settings Page to make changes as you like.
Most of the icons in this application are provided by Material Design Icons & Google Icons. Visit to see more from these brilliant communities.
